Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Swings fast, does great damage -- Can cast mark of the damned, to summon a skeleton upon a frag -- Lasts 150 seconds
local Tool = script.Parent local Hammer = Tool.Handle
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local myTorso local hammerSound
local skeletonValue = Tool:FindFirstChild("Skeleton") local mark = Tool:FindFirstChild("Mark")
local damage = 22
local spawnConnection
local bbGui = Instance.new("BillboardGui") bbGui.Name = "Child of the Hammer" bbGui.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) bbGui.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
local image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Name = "Child" image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53594614" image.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 image.Parent = bbGui
local bbClone local bbLocalClone
local co local rmCo
local puppet = Tool:FindFirstChild("Puppet")
local hammerSound local unAnchoredParts = {}
function resetConnection() print("Resetting") local duration = 5 while duration > 0 do if bbClone then bbClone.Child.Visible = not bbClone.Child.Visible end if bbLocalClone then bbLocalClone.Child.Visible = not bbLocalClone.Child.Visible end duration = duration - 0.5 wait(0.5) end print("Removing BB") if bbClone then bbClone:Remove() end if bbLocalClone then bbLocalClone:Remove() end if spawnConnection then spawnConnection:disconnect() end end
local skeleton
function bite(hit) if hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then humanoid:TakeDamage(12) end end
function removeCo(skeleton) duration = 150 while duration > 0 do duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end if skeleton then skeleton:Remove() end if puppet then puppet.Value = nil end end
function offsetModelBy(model, offset) local childs = model:GetChildren() for i = 1, #childs do if childs[i].className == "Part" or childs[i].className == "TrussPart" or childs[i].className == "WedgePart" then childs[i].CFrame = childs[i].CFrame + offset if not childs[i].Anchored then table.insert(unAnchoredParts, childs[i]) end childs[i].Anchored = true -- anchor everything elseif childs[i].className == "Tool" or childs[i].className == "Hat" or childs[i].className == "Model" then offsetModelBy(childs[i], offset) end end end
function spawnSkeleton(humanoid) skeleton = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(53604463) if skeleton then print("Inserting Model") skeleton = skeleton:GetChildren()[1] skeletonTorso = skeleton:FindFirstChild("Torso") while skeletonTorso == nil do wait(1.0) skeletonTorso = skeleton:FindFirstChild("Torso") end torso = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") unAnchoredParts = {} if torso then offsetVector = (torso.Position - skeleton.Torso.Position) else offsetVector = (myTorso.Position - skeleton.Torso.Position) end offsetModelBy(skeleton, offsetVector) skeleton.Parent = game.Workspace neck = skeleton.Torso.Neck neck.Part0 = skeleton.Head neck.Part1 = skeleton.Torso -- Hack -- for j = 1, 10 do skeleton.Humanoid.MaxHealth = 500 skeleton.Humanoid.Health = 500 skeleton:MakeJoints() wait(0.1) end -- unanchor everything for u = 1, #unAnchoredParts do unAnchoredParts[u].Anchored = false end
skeletonValue.Value = 1 skeleton.Humanoid.Health = 500 skeleton.Humanoid.Died:connect(function() if puppet then puppet.Value = nil end if skeletonValue then skeletonValue.Value = 0 end end) skeleton.Torso.Touched:connect(bite) rmCo = coroutine.create(removeCo) coroutine.resume(rmCo, skeleton) if puppet then puppet.Value = skeleton end end end
function blow(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Hammer or rightGrip.Part1 == Hammer) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) if mark.Value == 1 then print("Marking") mark.Value = 0 voidScript = Tool.VoidScript:Clone() voidScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent voidScript.Disabled = false if puppet.Value == nil then spawnConnection = humanoid.Died:connect(function() spawnSkeleton(humanoid) end) end bbClone = bbGui:Clone() bbLocalClone = bbGui:Clone() bbLocalClone.Parent = vPlayer.PlayerGui hitHead = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Head") if hitHead then bbLocalClone.Adornee = hitHead end player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(humanoid.Parent) if player then print("Parenting Gui") bbClone.Parent = player.PlayerGui bbClone.Adornee = hit.Parent.Head end co = coroutine.create(resetConnection) coroutine.resume(co) end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Value = player creator.Name = "creator" creator.Parent = humanoid debris:addItem(creator, 1) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end
hammerSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("HammerSound") if hammerSound then hammerSound:Play() end
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
function onUnequipped() if hammerSound then hammerSound:Stop() end if spawnConnection then spawnConnection:disconnect() end if skeleton then skeleton:Remove() end
if bbClone then bbClone:Remove() end if bbLocalClone then bbLocalClone:Remove() end if puppet then puppet.Value = nil end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Hammer.Touched:connect(blow)

-- INACTIVE ICONS -- -- 53557574 53557657 53557672 53557706 -- ACTIVE ICONS -- -- 53603082 53603120 53603150 53603172
-- Need to do a better job at swapping icons --
local Tool = script.Parent local Hammer = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid
local hammerAnim local stalkAnim
local skeletonValue = Tool:WaitForChild("Skeleton") --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer local mark = Tool:WaitForChild("Mark")
local co
local skeleGui
local puppet = Tool:WaitForChild("Puppet")
-- Puppet actions local dancing = false local following = false local attacking = false local explode = false
-- Image Buttons local imBt1 local imBt2 local imBt3 local imBt4
function dance() if dancing == false then dancing = true following = false attacking = false if stalkAnim then stalkAnim:Stop() end imBt1.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53603082" imBt2.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557657" imBt3.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557672" imBt4.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557706"
wait(0.5) if puppet and puppet.Value ~= nil then humanoid = puppet.Value:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then danceAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DanceAnim) if danceAnim then danceAnim:Play() end wait(2.5) end else if skeleGui then skeleGui:Remove() end end
dancing = false end end
function explode() imBt1.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557574" imBt2.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53603120" imBt3.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557672" imBt4.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557706" attacking = false following = false wait(0.5) if puppet and puppet.Value ~= nil then if stalkAnim then stalkAnim:Stop() end torso = puppet.Value:FindFirstChild("Torso") e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastPressure = 500000 e.BlastRadius = 10 e.Parent = game.Workspace e.Position = torso.Position else if skeleGui then skeleGui:Remove() end end wait(0.5) if puppet then puppet.Value = nil end if skeleGui then skeleGui:Remove() end end
function attack() if attacking == false then imBt1.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557574" imBt2.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557657" imBt3.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557672" imBt4.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53603172" attacking = true following = false local enemyChar if puppet then puppetChar = puppet.Value if puppetChar then torso = puppetChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") end if torso then players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do tempChar = players[i].Character if tempChar ~= vCharacter then distance = (tempChar.Torso.Position - torso.Position).magnitude if distance < 40 then enemyChar = tempChar end end end if enemyChar then stalkAnim = Tool:FindFirstChild("StalkAnim") if stalkAnim then stalkAnim:play() end while attacking and puppet do if puppetChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then puppetChar.Humanoid:MoveTo(enemyChar.Torso.Position, enemyChar.Torso) end wait(1.0) end end end else if skeleGui then skeleGui:Remove() end end end end
function follow() if following == false then imBt1.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557574" imBt2.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557657" imBt3.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53603150" imBt4.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557706" if stalkAnim then stalkAnim:Stop() end following = true attacking = false if puppet and vCharacter then puppetChar = puppet.Value if puppetChar then while following and puppet do if puppetChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then puppetChar.Humanoid:MoveTo(vCharacter.Torso.Position + ((puppetChar.Torso.Position - vCharacter.Torso.Position).unit * 5.0), vCharacter.Torso) end wait(1.0) end end else if skeleGui then skeleGui:Remove() end end end end
function createGui() if skeletonValue.Value == 1 then skeleGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") skeleGui.Name = "ControlGUI" vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) skeleGui.Parent = vPlayer.PlayerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = skeleGui frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.05, 0, 0.60, 0) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 175, 0, 175) frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
imBt1 = Instance.new("ImageButton") imBt1.Name = "Dance" imBt1.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557574" imBt1.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) imBt1.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) imBt1.Parent = frame imBt1.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 imBt1.MouseButton1Click:connect(dance)
imBt2 = Instance.new("ImageButton") imBt2.Name = "Explode" imBt2.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557657" imBt2.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) imBt2.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.5, 0) imBt2.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 imBt2.Parent = frame imBt2.MouseButton1Click:connect(explode)
imBt3 = Instance.new("ImageButton") imBt3.Name = "Follow" imBt3.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557672" imBt3.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) imBt3.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0, 0) imBt3.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 imBt3.Parent = frame imBt3.MouseButton1Click:connect(follow)
imBt4 = Instance.new("ImageButton") imBt4.Name = "Attack" imBt4.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=53557706" imBt4.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) imBt4.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) imBt4.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 imBt4.Parent = frame imBt4.MouseButton1Click:connect(attack) end end
skeletonValue.Changed:connect(createGui)
function wait12() wait(12) end
function castSpell(key) if key:lower() == "x" then if skeletonValue.Value == 0 then if co == nil or coroutine.status(co) == 'dead' then -- Cast mark of the damned on the target print("Ready to mark") mark.Value = 1 co = coroutine.create(wait12) coroutine.resume(co) fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = Hammer wait(5.0) fire:Remove() end end end end
local anims = {"Swing", "Slam"}
function onActivated() while Tool.Enabled == false do wait() end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
hammerAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild(anims[math.random(1,2)])) if hammerAnim then hammerAnim:Play() end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent mouse.KeyDown:connect(castSpell) end
function onUnequipped() if hammerAnim then hammerAnim:Stop() end if skeleGui then skeleGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local vCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local duration = 4
if myHumanoid then while duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(8) duration = duration - 1 wait(1) end end
wait(1.0) script:Remove()
